//import React from "react" import "./Header.css" import React, { Component } from 'react' export default class Header extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { active: "Home" } } handleClick(act) { console.log("Iam here") this.setState({ active: act }) console.log(act) } render() { return (
this.handleClick("Home")}>Home
this.handleClick("Timetable")}>Timetable
this.handleClick("Courses")}>Courses
this.handleClick("CourseRoad")}>CourseRoad
this.handleClick("Profile")}>Profile
) } } /*
Home
Timetable
Courses
CourseRoad
Profile
*/
